title: Analysis Project on Foreign Learners’ Living and Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic survey design and analysis methods, general awareness of multicultural environments
context.additional_context: Collaboration-driven data analysis and report writing using smartphone-based survey tools

learning_goals: Learners can design a survey instrument to systematically analyze foreign learners' living and learning environments.
Learners can produce a report deriving key issues and improvement measures based on collected data.
Learners can present practical proposals to educational institutions based on project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
